name: Burst Hero
description:
What's in Burst Hero?

  • Heroes
Different heroes have different abilities and skills, and carry different initial weapons.

  • Weapons
You can replace all kinds of weapons in the battle without any restrictions! Different weapons have different amounts of ammo, speed of fire, and firing methods.

  • Bullets
Any weapon can use any bullet. Although I don't know how it works, it is true. Customize your exclusive weapon by matching different weapons and bullets in battle.

  • Cards
Who collects cards on the battlefield? Maybe everyone will not miss it! Because these cards can provide various buff effects, through reasonable card construction, your ability will skyrocket and help you survive.

  • Store to visit anytime during battle
There is no need to wait for merchants to appear. After all, it is the Internet age, and it should be reasonable to shop online during the battle. Use the gold dropped by enemies to buy weapon bullets and cards in the store.

  • Hordes of enemies
Everything is ready, let the horse come!
